      • setIsZoomEnabled

        public final void setIsZoomEnabled(boolean isZoomEnabled)
        Allows you to enable/disable the zoom functionality on the ImageView. When disable the ImageView reverts to using the FIT_CENTER matrix.
        Parameters:
        isZoomEnabled - - Whether the zoom functionality is enabled.
